entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
